General.Name: Cloudbreak Discovery PLC
General.Description: Cloudbreak Discovery Plc engages in the natural resource project generation and royalty business worldwide. It primarily focuses on exploring for mineral properties and petroleum resources. The company is based in London, the United Kingdom.
